resources.string: This application needs access to your location in order to enable you create and monitor your geofences.\nPlease accept the permissions request when prompted.
You currently don\'t have geofences being monitored
This application requires access to your location services to work

This application requires access to your location services to work. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings
